input_email_body:
Subject: 

Hello Customer Support, I am contacting you to address a problem with my digital campaigns. The campaigns have come to a halt, and my metrics are not updating You can reach me at carlosm@gmail.com.. I believe this could be due to a configuration issue with my VPN-Router or a clash with my macOS environment. I have attempted to restart my system, update my software, and follow troubleshooting steps from Lynda.com, yet the issue remains unresolved My name is David Kim.. I would be very grateful if you could assist me in resolving this issue promptly. Kindly notify me if you require further details. I await your response. Thanks for your attention and support.
